Objective

MNIST Search Quest Winner-takes-the-Cake.

Then a normal lecture on Framewoks and Hardware for ML.

And then a retake on nanoGPT with a hands-on excersice.

Still active: bring Your own cup, if you need the coffee or tea I server!

Content

  • Frameworks for ML,
  • Hardware for ML,
    • CPUs,
    • GPUs,
    • TPUs,
    • Exotic Hardware.
  • A-retake on 'Introduction to GPTs
    • a hands-on exercise with nanoGPT.
